definitions: in a manner that is not officially authorized or confirmed

examples.text: the assets of the family are unofficially estimated to be $8 billion

shortDefinitions: in manner that is not officially authorized or confirmed

definitions: used to indicate strike action not called or endorsed by the union to which the strikers belong

examples.text: thousands of railwaymen struck unofficially for higher wages

shortDefinitions: used to indicate strike action not endorsed by union
